entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:02 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -31.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 06:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -31.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -34.3°C
Wind: ENE 54 km/h gust 66 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Blizzard developing early this morning. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 41 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 35 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 35 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023
